email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, LOA 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75. Can you check with the owner if they can adjust? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I spoke with the owner, and they are willing to adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable, and I can draft the fixture. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $51.00 works for us. Please proceed with the fixture. Also, could you confirm the laytime details? We need to ensure everything aligns with our schedule. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The laytime is 72 hours total, with 24 hours for loading and 48 hours for discharge. I’ll send over the fixture shortly for your review. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the laytime details look good. Please send over the fixture, and we’ll review it first thing tomorrow. Thanks for your help on this. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Fixture for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, please find attached the fixture for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Looking forward to your confirmation. Best regards, Sarah.
